item.description:
GUEST SPEAKER - ANN BELLAMY

 

This month's speaker is local Hard Money Lender (NH and MA) Ann Bellamy.  Ann's experience in the business as the Money partner in real estate deals has taught her a lot and she is coming to share with us what she's learned.  Come find out what to be careful of and how to stay protected in a deal.  For more information about this meeting please check the website.


The Best Western Hotel
187 Chelsmford St.
Cheslmford, MA 01824
When: 1st Wednesday of Each Month
Admission Fees

Guests: $20.00 at the Door
 

 

Check our website for the updated speaker schedule. www.newenglandreia.com


Ask about getting YOUR membership today! 

www.newenglandreia.com
item.how_to_find_us: We will be at the NEREIA desk located straight ahead when you enter the front door.

group.name: New England Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: Protecting Yourself as the Money Partner in an Real Estate Deal
